headline.main: Barack Obama Named Recipient of JFK Profile in Courage Award
headline.print_headline: Barack Obama Named Recipient of JFK Profile in Courage Award

docs.lead_paragraph: Former President Barack Obama was named the 2017 winner of the John F. Kennedy Profile in Courage Award on Thursday for carrying on his fellow Democrat's legacy.

headline.main: Obama-Era Human Rights Envoy Says U.N. Must Investigate Myanmar
headline.print_headline: Obama-Era Human Rights Envoy Says U.N. Must Investigate Myanmar

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N. Human Rights Council must set up a commission of inquiry into Myanmar's human rights record, as it has done for North Korea and Eritrea, and not spare its leader because of her iconic status, a former U.S. human rights envoy said on Monday.

headline.main: Trump Alleges Obama Had Trump Phones Wiretapped During Race
headline.print_headline: Trump Alleges Obama Had Trump Phones Wiretapped During Race

docs.lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump is accusing former President Barack Obama of having Trump's telephones "wire tapped" during last year's election, but Trump isn't offering any evidence or saying what prompted the allegation.

headline.main: First Draft Focus: ‘Never Too Late to Say Thank You’

headline.main: Specter, a Fulcrum of the Stimulus Bill, Pulls Off a Coup for Health Money
headline.print_headline: Specter, a Fulcrum of the Stimulus Bill, Pulls Off a Coup for Health Money
